body.name: Seventable Computer Desk with Power Outlets & LED Light, 39 inch Home Office Desk with 5 Drawers, Writing Desk with Monitor Stand, Work Desk for Home Office, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 4 hrs 24 mins
features: Computer Desk with Power Outlet: The computer desk is equipped with a built-in power strip with 2 outlets, 2 USB ports & 1 Type C, which provides convenience for charging your gaming gear, tablet, printer or phone. Stay powered up and get more done with ease

Experience Gaming in a Whole New Way: Elevate your gaming experience with this feature-packed desk. It comes with customizable multi-color RGB LED light strips that offer 60,000 colors to choose from. You can control the colors, brightness, mode, and timer settings using a phone app or controller. The LED lights can also dance to the beats of your music, letting you immerse in a romantic and energetic gaming atmosphere

Spacious Desk with 5 Convenient Fabric Drawers: Keep your workspace tidy with this desk's 5 durable drawers, perfect for storing documents, office and school supplies, or gaming equipment. The 3 left corner drawers are versatile and can be rearranged to fit your specific needs. Enjoy a clutter-free desktop with ease

Transform Your Workspace: Upgrade the way you work with this all-in-one computer desk. With five spacious fabric drawers and a monitor stand, you can store essentials and elevate your screen to reduce neck and back strain. The desktop is large enough for a laptop and books, making it easy to multitask and stay organized. Each drawer can support up to 8 lbs, giving you plenty of room for all your work essentials

Sturdy and Comfortable Desk Table: Constructed with a durable metal leg and sturdy wooden desktop, our desk offers stable support for all your writing, typing or gaming needs. The industrial design adds a touch of style to your office, study, or gaming space, while ensuring there is no wobble, ensuring maximum comfort and productivity. Experience the perfect blend of fashion and function with our versatile desk

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Easy Assembly
reviews.reviewText: I want to start off by saying that I was originally intimated before assembling this desk, given that I'd never built anything in my life, but I was pleasantly surprised at how easy the set the instructions were, as well as how simple the parts were labeled. This desk allows you two ways to set it up; build A has instructions for those who want the fabric drawers on the left, and build B has instructions for those who want the fabric drawers on the right. There is one mistake in the instruction manual however. I did build A and in step 11 it's instructed to screw in #9 when it's supposed to be #11, and the same is true for build B on step 36; it wasn't a big deal to me since I had already read the reviews that mentioned this. Overall, I am super pleased with both the quality of this desk, as well as how satisfying it was to build and how affordable it was. 10 out of 10!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great desk for a child or pre-teen
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, not just pressed wood that breaks easy but metal supports and legs. The LED lighting is great and my kid loves the different selections. Very functional with the power outlets, usb ports and hanger for headphones or bags. Good buy for the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for a vanity desk
reviews.reviewText: This product took over a week for delivery but was worth it. Even though some of the pieces were mislabeled and the instructions were a little disorienting (because it can be assembled twodifferent ways) it only took an hour or so to assemble for 2 people. The drawers are fabric (think foldable cubby drawer) and the front looks like pleather but isn't horribly noticeable. We're using it as a vanity for our daughter and it has plenty of space; plus the raised section is good for her perfumes and toiletries. It also feels pretty solid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: Great for the price. Bought 2 and not disappointed at all

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap CLOTH drawers
reviews.reviewText: This desk is made of cheap Materials! Literally the “drawers” are cloth boxes made for cube storage. We put my daughters skincare in one drawer and I tried to pull the drawer out from underneath it and it wouldn’t even open because the one on top says down from the weight of her skincare which isn’t even heavy! Super dissatisfied!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice modern updated desk
reviews.reviewText: My husband was using a table from Costco for his work desk for over a year. He asked for a desk for his birthday last November. So I picked out 3 choices from Amazon and he chose this one. He put it together and loves that his monitors are up higher so his neck doesn’t hurt and there is a charging station built in which is convenient. The only drawback is the drawers are made of cloth material they are not solid so you can only place lightweight items in them. The desk came packaged well and on time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m currently assembling this desk and I noticed the instructions are wrong in both assemblies. In step 36(assembly B) it mentions accessory 9 but I think it means 10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this dems it’s a lot more spacious than my old desk. It did take me about 4 hours to put together, but that is also due to the fact that I am not too handy. But all in all I love the different lights of color that it can change too. I definitely don’t regret my purchase at all.

Je les commander pour ma fille et j'aime beaucoup le fait d'avoir d'avoir beaucoup de rangement avec les prises accessible avec la lumière inclus ! Super pratique meilleures achat en meuble et très bon prix par rapport a tout le rangement et de place pour serrer des livre a colorier , crayons ,électronique etc...! Si je compare a d'autres bureau celui là tu as tout pour un jeune enfant :) celui-ci est le meilleur en terme de rangement et de qualitéet de grandeurs! Si j'aurais a en acheter un autre je le racheterai sans hésiter!

reviews.reviewTitle: Really good quality for the price you pay!
reviews.reviewText: I'm so happy with this desk. I was a little worried that the monitor stand wouldn't be wide enough but there were no issues at all. The drawers seemed a little flimsy and I was worried they wouldn't hold a lot of weight to them but I have been able to store up to 8 books in a single drawer with no concern at all. I'm super happy with my purchase and I highly recommend this desk.

Pretty easy to set up yourself. Yes I used the instructions! The outlets and the lights are a great addition. I use this as a nail desk for myself. All the additional outlets are handy. Basket drawers are a good sturdy quality.Overall very happy with the purchase.

The media could not be loaded. Pleased with product for what it is at the price point, But USB C plug does not work. All other’s work fine ,but this particular one not working is pretty disappointing, that with the led light not being as bright as advertised gives this a 3. Would be 5.
Easy to set up, big drawers, like the changing light colours with the raised shelf. Our grandson really likes it.
